trans-unit.source: (I'm ignoring *-items properties here, since they simply establish defaults for *-self.)
trans-unit.target: （我在这里忽略 *-items 属性，因为它们只是为 *-self 建立默认值。）

trans-unit.source: (The cross axis is always perpendicular to the main axis.)
trans-unit.target: (横轴始终垂直于主轴)。

trans-unit.source: auto margins
trans-unit.target: auto 边距

trans-unit.source: margin: auto is an alternative to justify-content: center and align-items: center.
trans-unit.target: margin: auto 是 justify-content: center 和 align-items: center 的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: (credit: @oriol for the code, and @crl for the label)
trans-unit.target: （信用：@oriol代表代码，@crl代表标签）

trans-unit.source: Consider a header section with a group of nav items and a logo. With justify-self the logo could be aligned left while the nav items stay far right, and the whole thing adjusts smoothly ("flexes") to different screen sizes.
trans-unit.target: 考虑带有一组导航项和徽标的标题部分。通过 justify-self ，徽标可以在左侧对齐，而导航项保持在最右侧，并且整个对象可以平滑调整（“弯曲度”）以适应不同的屏幕尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Here are two methods for solving this problem:
trans-unit.target: 这是解决此问题的两种方法：

trans-unit.source: NOTE: The examples above will only work – in terms of true centering – when the outermost items are equal height/width. When flex items are different lengths, see next example.
trans-unit.target: 注意：以上示例仅在最外层项的高度/宽度相等时才有效（就真正居中而言）。如果弹性商品的长度不同，请参见下一个示例。

trans-unit.source: Note that values space-around and space-between on justify-content property will not keep the middle item centered about the container if the adjacent items have different widths.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果相邻项目的宽度不同，则 justify-content 属性上的 space-around 和 space-between 值将不会使中间项目保持在容器中心。

trans-unit.source: Note that values space-around and space-between on justify-content property will not keep the middle item centered in relation to the container if the adjacent items have different widths (see demo).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果相邻项目的宽度不同，则 justify-content 属性上的 space-around 和 space-between 值将不会使中间项目相对于容器居中（请参见demo）。

trans-unit.source: So why does the cross axis get two additional alignment properties?
trans-unit.target: 那么，为什么十字轴具有两个附加的对齐属性？

trans-unit.source: Why are align-content and align-items consolidated into one property for the main axis?
trans-unit.target: 为什么将 align-content 和 align-items 合并为主轴的一个属性？

trans-unit.source: Why does the main axis not get a justify-self property?
trans-unit.target: 为什么主轴没有获得“ justify-self 属性？

trans-unit.source: justify-content: space-same (concept)
trans-unit.target: 证明内容：空间相同（概念）

trans-unit.source: justify-content
trans-unit.target: justify-content

trans-unit.source: 8.1. Aligning with auto margins
trans-unit.target: 8.1。与 auto 边距对齐

trans-unit.source: center ~ Flex items are packed toward the center of the line.
trans-unit.target: center 〜柔性物品被包装到生产线的中心。

trans-unit.source: flex-end ~ Flex items are packed toward the end of the line.
trans-unit.target: flex-end end〜Flex项目包装在行尾。

trans-unit.source: flex-start ~ Flex items are packed toward the start of the line.
trans-unit.target: flex-start start〜Flex项目包装在行的开头。

trans-unit.source: space-around ~ Same as space-between except with half-size spaces on both ends.
trans-unit.target: space-around 〜与 space-between 相同，但两端均留有一半大小的间隔。

trans-unit.source: space-between ~ Flex items are evenly spaced, with the first item aligned to one edge of the container and the last item aligned to the opposite edge. The edges used by the first and last items depends on flex-direction and writing mode (ltr or rtl).
trans-unit.target: space-between 〜Flex的项都均匀地隔开，具有对齐到容器的一个边缘对准到相对的边缘的最后一个项目的第一项。第一项和最后一项使用的边缘取决于 flex-direction 和写入模式（ ltr 或 rtl ）。

trans-unit.source: space-same ~ A hybrid of space-between and space-around. Flex items are evenly spaced (like space-between), except instead of half-size spaces on both ends (like space-around), there are full-size spaces on both ends.
trans-unit.target: space-same same〜 space-between 和 space-around 。伸缩项的间距是均匀的（例如 space-between 间距），除了两端没有半角的空格（例如， space-around ）以外，两端还有全角的空格。

trans-unit.source: Other useful scenarios:
trans-unit.target: 其他有用的方案：

trans-unit.source: Solution #1: Absolute Positioning
trans-unit.target: 解决方案1：绝对定位

trans-unit.source: Solution #2: Nested Flex Containers (no absolute positioning)
trans-unit.target: 解决方案2：嵌套式Flex容器（无绝对定位）

trans-unit.source: UPDATE: Browsers have begun implementing space-evenly, which accomplishes the above. See this post for details: Equal space between flex items
trans-unit.target: 更新：浏览器已开始实现 space-evenly ，从而完成了上述任务。有关详细信息，请参见此帖子：弹性项目之间的间距相等

trans-unit.source: Source: W3C
trans-unit.target: 资料来源：W3C

trans-unit.source: Source: W3C
trans-unit.target: 资料来源：W3C

trans-unit.source: A flex container aligns flex items by distributing free space.
trans-unit.target: 柔性容器通过分配自由空间,将柔性物品排列在一起。

trans-unit.source: Align group of flex items to the right, but first item to the left
trans-unit.target: 将弹性项目组向右对齐,但第一个项目向左对齐

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use a pseudo-element instead of an actual DOM element. Or you can use absolute positioning. All three methods are covered here: Center and bottom-align flex items
trans-unit.target: 另外，您可以使用伪元素代替实际的DOM元素。或者，您可以使用绝对定位。此处介绍了所有三种方法：居中对齐和底部对齐的弹性项目

trans-unit.source: As noted, unless all flex items are of equal width or height (depending on flex-direction), the middle item cannot be truly centered. This problem makes a strong case for a justify-self property (designed to handle the task, of course).
trans-unit.target: 如前所述，除非所有flex项目的宽度或高度相等（取决于 flex-direction ），否则中间项目无法真正居中。这个问题为 justify-self 属性（当然是设计用来处理任务）提供了有力的依据。

trans-unit.source: As of this writing, there is no mention of justify-self or justify-items in the flexbox spec.
trans-unit.target: 在撰写本文时，在flexbox规范中没有提及 justify-self 或 justify-items 。

trans-unit.source: As stated in the question:
trans-unit.target: 如问题中所述:

trans-unit.source: Auto Margins
trans-unit.target: 自动调节器利润率

trans-unit.source: But justify-content can work here because auto margins always have priority. From the spec:
trans-unit.target: 但是 justify-content 可以在这里工作，因为 auto 边距始终是优先事项。从规格：

trans-unit.source: Center a flex item vertically and horizontally
trans-unit.target: 垂直和水平方向上的柔性项目居中

trans-unit.source: Center a flex item when adjacent items vary in size
trans-unit.target: 当相邻项目的大小不一时,将一个柔性项目居中

trans-unit.source: Center a flex item, and center a second flex item between the first and the edge
trans-unit.target: 将一个弯曲件居中,并将第二个弯曲件居中,在第一个弯曲件和边缘之间居中

trans-unit.source: Consider the main axis and cross axis of a flex container:
trans-unit.target: 考虑柔性容器的主轴和横轴。

trans-unit.source: Each .box item is given flex: 1 in order to distribute container space equally.
trans-unit.target: 每个 .box 项都指定了 flex: 1 ，以便平均分配容器空间。

trans-unit.source: Each child div (.box) is now a flex item.
trans-unit.target: 现在，每个子div（ .box ）都是一个弹性项目。

trans-unit.source: Expand snippet
trans-unit.target: 扩展片段

trans-unit.source: For multi-line flexbox, the same logic applies to each "flex line". In a given line, items are aligned individually in the cross axis (since there's only one item per line, in the cross axis), vs. collectively in the main axis.
trans-unit.target: 对于多行的flexbox,每个 "flex线 "的逻辑是一样的。在给定的行中,项目在横轴上单独对齐(因为每行只有一个项目,在横轴上),而在主轴上集体对齐。

trans-unit.source: Going back to justify-content for a minute, here's an idea for one more option.
trans-unit.target: 回到正 justify-content 一分钟，这里有一个更多选择的想法。

trans-unit.source: Hence, in order to create equal balance, so that a middle item can be centered in the container with a single item alongside, a counterbalance must be introduced.
trans-unit.target: 因此，为了建立平衡，以便使中间物料可以在容器中居中放置单个物料，必须引入平衡。

trans-unit.source: Here's another way of phrasing it: so, all of the *-self and *-content properties are about how to distribute extra space around things. But the key difference is that the *-self versions are for cases where there's only a single thing in that axis, and the *-content versions are for when there are potentially many things in that axis. The one-thing vs. many-things scenarios are different types of problems, and so they have different types of options available -- for example, the space-around / space-between values make sense for *-content, but not for *-self.
trans-unit.target: 这里的措辞它的另一种方式：所以，所有的 *-self 和 *-content 属性是如何乾坤分配额外空间。但关键的区别是， *-self 版本的情况下，有仅在轴一个单一的东西，而 *-content 版本时，有可能对在轴很多东西。一件事对许多，事情情况是不同类型的问题，所以他们有不同类型的选择-例如， space-around / space-between 值，使感官 *-content ，而不是 *-self 。

trans-unit.source: Here's how it works:
trans-unit.target: 以下是它的工作原理。

trans-unit.source: However, in the CSS Box Alignment Module, which is the W3C's unfinished proposal to establish a common set of alignment properties for use across all box models, there is this:
trans-unit.target: 但是，在CSS框对齐模块（这是W3C尚未完成的建议中，以建立一套通用的对齐属性供所有框模型使用）中，是这样的：

trans-unit.source: However, these directions can be easily interchanged with the flex-direction property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这些方向可以很容易地与 flex-direction 属性互换。

trans-unit.source: I know this doesn't use flexbox, but for the simple use-case of three items (one at left, one at center, one at right), this can be accomplished easily using display: grid on the parent, grid-area: 1/1/1/1; on the children, and justify-self for positioning of those children.
trans-unit.target: 我知道这并不使用flexbox，但是对于三个项目的简单用例（一个在左边，一个在中心，一个在右边），可以使用 display: grid 轻松实现：父级 grid-area: 1/1/1/1; ，网格区域： 1/1/1/1; 在孩子 justify-self ，并为这些孩子的定位自我辩护。

trans-unit.source: I know this is not an answer, but I'd like to contribute to this matter for what it's worth. It would be great if they could release justify-self for flexbox to make it truly flexible.
trans-unit.target: 我知道这不是答案，但是我想为这个问题做出贡献。如果他们可以为flexbox 发布 justify-self 使其真正具有灵活性，那就太好了。

trans-unit.source: I truly hope, W3C takes notice of this and will at least consider it. =)
trans-unit.target: 我真的希望,W3C会注意到这一点,至少会考虑到这一点。)

trans-unit.source: I'll end by reiterating the main question:
trans-unit.target: 最后,我重申一下主要问题。

trans-unit.source: In CSS Flexbox, why are there no “justify-items” and “justify-self” properties
trans-unit.target: 在CSS Flexbox中,为什么没有 "justify-items "和 "justify-self "属性?

trans-unit.source: In contrast, in the cross axis, we have both a *-self and a *-content property. One determines how we'll distribute space around the many flex lines (align-content), whereas the other (align-self) determines how to distribute space around individual flex items in the cross axis, within a given flex line.
trans-unit.target: 相反，在交叉轴，我们既是 *-self 和 *-content 属性。一个决定了我们如何在许多弯曲线（ align-content ）周围分配空间，而另一个决定（ align-self ）确定了如何在给定的弯曲线内在交叉轴上的各个弯曲项目周围分配空间。

trans-unit.source: In the examples below, invisible third flex items (boxes 61 & 68) are introduced to balance out the "real" items (box 63 & 66).
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">在下面的示例中，引入了不可见的第三柔性项目（框61和68）以平衡“真实”项目（框63和66）。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: In the examples below, the middle item is centered with absolute positioning and the outer items remain in-flow. But the same layout can be achieved in reverse fashion: Center the middle item with justify-content: center and absolutely position the outer items.
trans-unit.target: 在以下示例中，中间项目以绝对定位为中心，而外部项目保持流入。但是，可以通过相反的方式实现相同的布局：将中间项目 justify-content: center 并包含居中内容：居中并绝对定位外部项目。

trans-unit.source: In the image above, the main axis is horizontal and the cross axis is vertical. These are the default directions of a flex container.
trans-unit.target: 在上图中,主轴为水平方向,横轴为垂直方向。这些都是柔性容器的默认方向。

trans-unit.source: Instead of this code on the flex container:
trans-unit.target: 而不是在flex容器上的这个代码。

trans-unit.source: It is applied to the flex container but only affects flex items.
trans-unit.target: 它适用于柔性容器,但只影响柔性项目。

trans-unit.source: It's my belief that when there are multiple items on the axis, the most logical way for justify-self to behave is to align itself to its nearest neighbours (or edge) as demonstrated below.
trans-unit.target: 我相信，当轴上有多个项目时， justify-self 行为的最合乎逻辑的方式是使其自身与最近的邻居（或边缘）对齐，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Just keep in mind that, like all absolutely positioned elements, the items are removed from the document flow. This means they don't take up space in the container and can overlap their siblings.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，与所有绝对定位的元素一样，这些项目也会从文档流中删除。这意味着它们不会占用容器中的空间，并且可以使它们的兄弟姐妹重叠。

trans-unit.source: Make each item a (nested) flex container and add justify-content: center.
trans-unit.target: 使每个项目成为一个（嵌套的）flex容器，并添加 justify-content: center 。

trans-unit.source: Methods for Aligning Flex Items along the Main Axis
trans-unit.target: 沿主轴对准柔性项目的方法

trans-unit.source: My point in describing how the axes' work is that there doesn't seem to be anything special about either direction. Main axis, cross axis, they're both equal in terms of importance and flex-direction makes it easy to switch back and forth.
trans-unit.target: 在描述轴的工作方式时，我的观点是，这两个方向似乎都没有什么特别之处。主轴，横轴在重要性上均相等，并且 flex-direction 使其易于来回切换。

trans-unit.source: Now each span element is a centered flex item.
trans-unit.target: 现在，每个 span 元素都是一个居中的flex项目。

trans-unit.source: Now the items are consuming all space in the row and are equal width.
trans-unit.target: 现在这一行的物品都是消耗了所有的空间,而且是等宽的。

trans-unit.source: Of course, this method is nothing great in terms of semantics.
trans-unit.target: 当然,这种方法在语义上并没有什么了不起的地方。

trans-unit.source: One answer may be: Because they're not necessary.
trans-unit.target: 一个答案可能是：因为没有必要。

trans-unit.source: Place a flex item in the corner
trans-unit.target: 在角落里放上一个柔性物品

trans-unit.source: Prior to alignment via justify-content and align-self, any positive free space is distributed to auto margins in that dimension.
trans-unit.target: 在通过 justify-content 和 align-self 对齐之前，任何正的自由空间都会分配给该维度中的自动边距。

trans-unit.source: SO: In a flexbox's main axis, there are many things to distribute space around. So a *-content property makes sense there, but not a *-self property.
trans-unit.target: SO：在flexbox的主轴上，有很多东西可以分配空间。因此，一个 *-content 属性是有道理的有，但不是 *-self 属性。

trans-unit.source: Scenario from the question:
trans-unit.target: 从题中的情景。

trans-unit.source: Scenarios where these properties would be useful:
trans-unit.target: 在哪些情况下,这些属性是有用的。

trans-unit.source: Show code snippet
trans-unit.target: 显示代码片段

trans-unit.source: The flexbox specification provides two methods for aligning flex items along the main axis:
trans-unit.target: 所述Flexbox的规范提供2点用于对准沿主轴弯曲的物品的方法：

trans-unit.source: The justify-content property aligns flex items along the main axis of the flex container.
trans-unit.target: 该 justify-content 属性对齐沿着曲容器的主轴弯曲的物品。

trans-unit.source: The justify-content keyword property, and
trans-unit.target: 该 justify-content 的关键字属性，

trans-unit.source: The ease of making awesome layouts are endless, take a look at this "complex" example.
trans-unit.target: 制作令人敬畏的布局的易度是无穷无尽的,看看这个 "复杂 "的例子吧。

trans-unit.source: The flexbox spec allows for absolute positioning of flex items. This allows for the middle item to be perfectly centered regardless of the size of its siblings.
trans-unit.target: flexbox规范允许弹性项目的绝对定位。这使得中间项目可以完美地居中，而不考虑其同级大小。

trans-unit.source: The question then asks:
trans-unit.target: 这时的问题又问:

trans-unit.source: The top-level div (.container) is a flex container.
trans-unit.target: 顶级div（ .container ）是一个flex容器。

trans-unit.source: There are five alignment options:
trans-unit.target: 有五种对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: They work by consuming all free space in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 它们的工作原理是消耗指定方向的所有空闲空间。

trans-unit.source: This alternative is useful when centering a flex item that overflows the container.
trans-unit.target: 当居中溢出容器的flex项目居中时，此替代方法很有用。

trans-unit.source: This layout can be achieved with ::before and ::after pseudo-elements on the flex container.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用flex容器上的 ::before 和 ::after 伪元素来实现此布局。

trans-unit.source: This was asked on the www-style list, and Tab Atkins (spec editor) provided an answer explaining why. I'll elaborate on that a bit here.
trans-unit.target: 这是在www样式列表中提出的，Tab Atkins（规范编辑器）提供了解释原因的答案。我会在这里详细说明。

trans-unit.source: This way you can have an item that is truly centered regardless of the size of the left and right box. When one of the boxes reaches the point of the center box it will simply push it until there is no more space to distribute.
trans-unit.target: 这样一来,你就可以拥有一个真正居中的物品,无论左右两边的盒子大小,都能真正做到居中。当其中一个箱子到达中心箱的位置时,它就会简单地将其推进,直到没有更多的空间来分配。

trans-unit.source: To align flex items along the cross axis there are three properties:
trans-unit.target: 要沿横轴对齐柔性项目,有三个属性。

trans-unit.source: To align flex items along the cross axis there are three properties: align-content, align-items and align-self.
trans-unit.target: 要使弹性项沿横轴 align-content ，有三个属性：align-content， align-items 和 align-self 。

trans-unit.source: To align flex items along the main axis there is one property:
trans-unit.target: 要沿着主轴对齐柔性项目,有一个属性。

trans-unit.source: To align flex items along the main axis there is one property: justify-content
trans-unit.target: 要沿主轴对齐弹性项目，有一个属性： justify-content

trans-unit.source: To start out, let's initially assume our flex container is single-line (flex-wrap: nowrap). In this case, there's clearly an alignment difference between the main axis and the cross axis -- there are multiple items stacked in the main axis, but only one item stacked in the cross axis. So it makes sense to have a customizeable-per-item "align-self" in the cross axis (since each item is aligned separately, on its own), whereas it doesn't make sense in the main axis (since there, the items are aligned collectively).
trans-unit.target: 首先，让我们首先假设我们的flex容器是单行的（ flex-wrap: nowrap ）。在这种情况下，主轴和横轴之间显然存在对齐差异-主轴上堆叠了多个项目，但在横轴上仅堆叠了一个项目。因此，在横轴上有一个可自定义的“ align-self”项是有意义的（因为每个项目都是单独对齐的），而在主轴上没有意义（因为在那儿，项目统一排列）。

trans-unit.source: Unlike justify-content, which is applied to the flex container, auto margins go on flex items.
trans-unit.target: 与用于flex容器的 justify-content 不同，flex项具有 auto 边距功能。

trans-unit.source: Use flex auto margins to shift the outer spans left and right.
trans-unit.target: 使用弹性 auto 边距左右移动外部 span 。

trans-unit.source: Why are there no "justify-items" and "justify-self" properties?
trans-unit.target: 为什么没有 "justify-items "和 "justify-self "的属性?

trans-unit.source: Why are there no justify-items and justify-self properties?
trans-unit.target: 为什么没有 justify-items 和 justify-self 属性？

trans-unit.source: With auto margins, flex items can be centered, spaced away or packed into sub-groups.
trans-unit.target: 使用 auto 边距，可以将弹性项目居中，隔开或打包成子组。

trans-unit.source: You can use this on the flex item:
trans-unit.target: 你可以在柔性项目上使用。

trans-unit.source: You could also forgo justify-content and use auto margins exclusively.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以放弃 justify-content 而仅使用 auto 边距。

trans-unit.source: You'll notice that justify-self and justify-items are being considered... but not for flexbox.
trans-unit.target: 您会注意到，考虑了 justify-self 和 justify-items ... 但对于flexbox却没有。

trans-unit.source: in a row of three flex items, affix the middle item to the center of the container (justify-content: center) and align the adjacent items to the container edges (justify-self: flex-start and justify-self: flex-end).
trans-unit.target: 在三个flex项目的行中，将中间项目粘贴到容器的中心（ justify-content: center ），并将相邻的项目与容器边缘对齐（ justify-self: flex-start 和 justify-self: flex-end ）。

trans-unit.target: jsFiddle版本

trans-unit.source: making a group of flex items align-right (justify-content: flex-end) but have the first item align left (justify-self: flex-start)
trans-unit.target: 使一组flex项右对齐（ justify-content: flex-end ），但使第一个flex项向左对齐（ justify-self: flex-start ）

trans-unit.source: placing a flex item in a corner .box { align-self: flex-end; justify-self: flex-end; }
trans-unit.target: 将flex项目放置在角落 .box { align-self: flex-end; justify-self: flex-end; }

trans-unit.source: placing a flex item in the corner of the flex container
trans-unit.target: 将柔性物品放在柔性容器的角落里
